Plot: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillian threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.
Title: Mystery Men
Writer: Neil Cuthbert, Bob Burden (creator: comic book series)
Actors: Ben Stiller, Hank Azaria, William H. Macy, Janeane Garofalo
tomatoConsensus: Absurd characters and quirky gags are brought to life by a talented cast, providing this superhero spoof with lots of laughs.
